summary: Scheduled Banners and Monday.com Banner Sync Testing Complete. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Backend schedule filtering works correctly - banners with future start_date hidden, expired banners hidden, active date range banners shown. Monday.com sync endpoints working: GET config returns default with enabled=false, PUT config saves settings, GET boards lists 100 real boards, POST sync returns 'skipped' when not configured. Frontend code review confirmed: ShowcaseAdminModule has 3 sub-tabs (Banners, Monday.com, Media Player), banner editor shows Start Date and End Date fields, Monday.com tab has enable toggle, board ID input, column mappings for all fields, workflow guide. Banners synced from Monday.com show 'Synced from Monday.com' badge via source='monday' check. Landing page verified: BannerCarousel shows 7 banners including 2 from Monday.com sync, MediaPlayer displays correctly, cultural icons render, bottom nav functional.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/banners creates banner with start_date and end_date fields
Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners filters by schedule - future-dated banners hidden
Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners filters by schedule - expired banners hidden
Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners filters by schedule - active date range banners visible
Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners shows banners without dates (no filtering)
Backend: GET /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/config returns default config (enabled=false)
Backend: PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/config saves configuration with columns
Backend: GET /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/boards lists 100 Monday.com boards with columns
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/sync returns 'skipped' when not configured
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/sync works with valid board config
Backend: Banner source field tracks origin (source='manual' for manually created)
Backend: Existing Monday.com synced banners visible (monday_11265842994, monday_11265839256)
Frontend: Landing page shows banner carousel with 7 banners
Frontend: Banner carousel includes Monday.com synced banners
Frontend: Media player renders with 16:9 aspect ratio
Frontend: Cultural icons render correctly (PinPan, Tienda, Ranking, etc)
Frontend: Bottom nav functional (Home, Explore, Store, Cart, Login)
Code Review: ShowcaseAdminModule has 3 sub-tabs (Banners, Monday.com, Media Player)
Code Review: BannerEditor shows Start Date and End Date input fields
Code Review: Monday.com tab has enable toggle, board ID input, column mappings
Code Review: Monday.com tab shows workflow guide (Canva → Monday.com → App)
Code Review: Banners with source='monday' show 'Synced from Monday.com' badge
critical_code_review_comments: Schedule filtering in showcase/__init__.py correctly checks start_date <= today <= end_date
MondayBannerAdapter properly parses column values from Monday.com API response
Banner source tracking implemented - source='manual' for new banners, source='monday' for synced
ShowcaseAdminModule.jsx has proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Column mappings support 8 fields: canva_url, text, bg_color, link_url, start_date, end_date, status, banner_type
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Existing Monday.com synced banners verified: monday_11265842994, monday_11265839256
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 96 tested scheduled banners and Monday.com banner sync feature. Backend endpoints: /api/showcase/banners filters by start_date/end_date automatically, /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/config stores sync configuration, /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/boards lists available boards, /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/sync triggers sync. Frontend: ShowcaseAdminModule has 3 tabs (Banners, Monday.com, Media Player). Admin requires LaoPan OAuth authentication. Monday.com API key is live and returns 100 real boards. The schedule filtering is working - testing agent verified future-dated and expired banners are correctly hidden from public endpoint.
